message.content:
When you were 6 years old, your sister was half your age, so she was 6 / 2 = 3 years old at that time. Since you are now 80 years old, let's calculate your sister's current age:

The age difference between the two of you remains constant, which is 6 - 3 = 3 years. Therefore, if you are currently 80 years old, your sister must be 80 - 3 = 77 years old. So, your sister is now 77 years old.
